page.title: 21River Roding clean again
page.content:
Many years of conservation have resulted in the River Roding flowing clean. Wildlife abounds, including many species not found in earlier years - Little Egrets, Kingfishers and Cormorants! Exotic Mink also are present.

The danger of flooding is still present although much work has been done to reduce the potential impact.
Contribution by: Chris Kurton
